channel.title: Latest News | Bruggen lab @ University of Zurich

item.title: Congratulations to Danielle Fehr for the wining of graubünden forscht 2022
item.description:
Congratulations to Danielle Fehr for the wining of #graubünden forscht 2022

The Academia Raetica Switzerland congratulates the winners of #graubünden forscht 2022. We would like to thank all speakers, chairs, helpers and visitors for being there! See you again in 2024!

item.title: Celgene Inflammatory Skin Disease Award 2018
item.description:
Celgene Inflammatory Skin Disease Award, Department of Dermatology, University Hospital Zurich

Wir gratulieren! Dr. med. PhD Marie-Charlotte Brüggen (auf dem Foto in der Mitte) von der Dermatologischen Klinik des #USZ gewinnt den Skin Disease Award 2018 für ihr Forschungsprojekt.
